attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Follow the Australians by introducing polymer (plastic) banknotes in Britain. Polymer banknotes are made from the polymer biaxially-oriented polypropylene (BOPP) which greatly enhances durability of the banknotes. Polymer banknotes also incorporate many security features not available to paper banknotes, making counterfeiting much more difficult.
